::KitKat::

She had the labs and all other restricted areas sealed off.  No one 
would get into without her permission. She had the computer controls 
set to her voice and Destructor's voice only as the ones to authorize 
commands. She locked off the bridge to all except her and 
Destructor.  She closed off most of the personel quarters except to 
that bot who's room it was and Destructor.  She then finally sat down 
i the lab and relaxed a bit in the chair.  "OK,  now that all that is 
done, anything else you think we need to do to prepare for them.  Oh 
yeah,  We need to give then two rooms.  We will need to make your 
guests feel comfortable." She smiled. Part of her wanted this to 
really work and have the two groups unite and become an even bigger, 
stronger group.  But at the same time, she wasn't going to  just let 
them walk in and do this,  if a trust was to develope, Aracnia would 
have to prove herself.
